It operates in three segments: Sales, Maintenance, and GFC Shanghai. The company offers passenger, high speed, and home elevators, as well as escalators/moving walks and pneumatic vacuum elevators. It is also involved in sale and manufacture of elevators and parts; sale of vacuum pneumatic shuttle; and sale and installation of diesel generators. The company's products are used in offices and factories, shopping malls, hotels, mansions, hospitals, public constructions, and institutes projects. Golden Friends Corporation was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Golden Friends Corporation is a subsidiary of Changjiang Property Co., Ltd.

4510.TWO.summary: Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd operates in the mold processing industry in Taiwan and internationally. It offers double column, vertical, horizontal, high speed double column, moving cross rail double column, and gantry machining centers, as well as drilling and tapping machining centers. The company was formerly known as Kao Fong Iron Factory and changed its name to Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd. in 1972. Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd was founded in 1968 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan. Kao Fong Machinery Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Hota Industrial Mfg. Co., Ltd.

4526.TW.summary: Tongtai Machine & Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machines worldwide. The company offers machine tools, such as vertical machining, 5-axis machining, tapping, horizontal machining, 5-axis horizontal machining, multi-tasking turning, and ultrasonic assisted machining centers, as well as boring and milling machines, horizontal and vertical CNC lathes, and wheel machines; and PCB machines, including drilling and routing machines. It also provides laser drilling and marking machines; and additive manufacturing machines consisting of metal powder direct energy deposition and subtractive manufacturing, metal powder bed fusion, and sand binder jetting machines. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4530.TWO.summary: Honyi International Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic injection molds. The company offers precision thermoplastic injection molds for use in various applications, including automotive, home appliances, computer, consumers, communication, electronics, etc. It also provides various enclosure manufacturing services, such as tooling fabrication, injection molding, sheet metal stamping, secondary post-molding process, and final assembly services in automotive, home appliance, and information tech. applications. Honyi International Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4532.TW.summary: Rechi Precision Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells compressors in Taiwan and internationally. It offers inverter and constant-speed rotary compressors; BLDC motors; inverter controllers; and heat pump water heaters. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

4533.TWO.long_name: Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd.
4533.TWO.summary: Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells mechanical press equipment. The company offers automation press production line solutions; servo presses; straight side mechanical presses; link mechanical presses; special application presses; and C frame and solid frame mechanical presses. It serves clients in Europe, the United States, Thailand, and Mexico. The company was formerly known as Shieh Yih Chuang Ironworks Co. and changed its name to Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. in 1982. Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4537.TWO.long_name: Shuz Tung Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd.
4537.TWO.summary: Shuz Tung Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machinery and automation equipment in Taiwan and China. The company provides pipe/tube benders, such as auto, semi-auto, and special customer pipe benders; bicycle manufacture equipment, which include pre-preparations, fork preparations, front fork processes, frame assembling's, wheel/rim makings, bike assembling's, EN testers, handlebar processes, and fixtures; and end forming machinery, such as pipe shape forming, pipe end forming, and pipe end processing machines. It also offers auto integration that include intelligent welding robots, ATV welding robot sets, intelligent handling robots, auto saddle products, and laser cuttings; hydroforming OEM for application in bicycle, gardening, lighting, transportation, and bath industries; laser welding solution; and 3D laser cutting machine. Shuz Tung Machinery Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

4541.TWO.summary: Magnate Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aerospace components and assemblies in Taiwan. The company offers landing gears, aerospace comprehensives, engine casings, and heat exchangers. It also provides other precision machinery components and assemblies, and food industry machinery. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

4546.TWO.summary: Chaheng Precision Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells aero-engine components in Taiwan. The company offers aero-engine fan blades, compressor and combustor assemblies, and OGV diffusers; and toles, oil collectors, flow dividers, rings, thermy off plates, cones, inner barrels, fans, and dome combustion chamber baffles. It also provides aero-engine assemblies and other products, including bracket, compressor actuation linkage assy, fan bootstrap bracket, seal, manifold-low pressure turbine and machining bracket, probe, and retaining seal, as well as stationary-AIR, AFT, BRG, and 4B pressure seal. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4553.TWO.summary: ALFOT Technologies Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells OEM aluminum forging products primarily in Taiwan. The company offers automotive aluminum forging parts, including brackets, control arms, suspension arms, pistons, etc. for use in suspension and cushion systems in car chassis, as well as in engine systems; and motorcycle aluminum forging parts, such as connectors, handgrips, driving arms, pistons, etc. that are used in the body structure of motorcycles, steering systems, and engine systems. It also provides other aluminum forging parts comprising storz, check handgrip, bundle, spray gun, etc. for use in fire-fighting equipment, industrial equipment, machinery industry, hand tool industry, and bicycle industry. ALFOT Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4556.TWO.summary: Bright Sheland International Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells industrial filtration and separation systems under the Filtrafine brand in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers melt-blown, wound-fine, activated carbon, membrane, high flow, and glass fiber filter cartridges, as well as pleated cartridges; and plastic-type, single round, single-bag, multi-bag, sanitary, high flow, and multi-round filter housings. It also provides filter bags and bag filter housings; modular bag housing skids; and UV disinfection and TOC reduction units, and spare parts, as well as technical support and after-sales services. The company serves chemical processing, microelectronics industry, oil and gas filtration, water treatment, food and beverage industry, and pharmaceutical industry sectors. Bright Sheland International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4561.TWO.summary: Kenturn Nano. Tec. Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, fabricates, and markets machine tool spindles in Taiwan. It offers CNC machining center, tapping center, and direct and gear drive spindles; turning center spindles, which includes belt drive-horizontal and vertical spindles; and CNC internal and external spindles. The company also provides square, ball nose, and corner radius end mills; special cutting tools; and spindle repair service. Its products are used in aerospace, automotive, locomotive, biotechnology, woodworking machines, shipbuilding, medical equipment, electronic semiconductor manufacturing, and IT industries under the KENTURN brand name. The company also exports its products. Kenturn Nano. Tec. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4563.TWO.summary: Quaser Machine Tools, Inc. manufactures and sells machine tools in Europe, Asia, North America, South America, Africa, and Oceania. It offers vertical, 5-axis mill-turn, pallet, horizontal, and multi face 5 axes M/C machine tools, as well as FMC series products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

4566.TW.summary: GLOBAL TEK FABRICATION CO., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision parts and subassemblies. It offers products for manufacturers of airbag inflators, steering systems, engines renovation systems, EGRs, turbochargers, DCTs, belt tension systems, assembly cam shaft systems, AEBs, ELSDs, transmission system components, etc., as well as jack heads, oil servers, and heat exchange systems. The company also provides products for use in various industrial applications, including industrial instrumentation, wafer fab equipment, bicycles, and aviation industry. It operates in Asia, the United States, Europe, Canada, Mexico, South America, Brazil, and internationally. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4568.TWO.summary: Koge Micro Tech Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells various precision pumps and valves worldwide. The company offers air, vacuum, water, gear, and electromagnetic pumps; and one, two, and three-way, as well as combined and lineartype solenoid valves. It also provides rotary diaphragm, diaphragm, air linear, piezoelectric, and centrifugal pumps. In addition, the company offers OEM/ODM services. Its products are used in fuel cell, energy and environment, environmental monitoring, detection analysis, medical devices, automotive products, healthcare equipment, beauty care apparatus, and household appliance fields. Koge Micro Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4572.TW.summary: Drewloong Precision, Inc. produces and sells aero structural and engine parts, landing gear parts, and special tools to aircraft manufacturers. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

4575.TWO.summary: Chumpower Machinery Corp. manufactures PET blow molding molding machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products are used in various application, such as mineral water, carbonated beverages, seasonings, tea, fruit juice, distilled water, alcoholic beverages, cooking oil, cleaning agents, cosmetics, fizzy drinks, cosmetic cleanser, detergents, tennis ball cans, medicine bottles, heat-resisting bottles etc. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4576.TW.summary: Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells components, systems, and equipment for linear motion and control system in Taiwan. The company offers controllers and drives, servo and linear actuators, positioning measurement systems, stepping/servo linear motors, linear motor stages, torque motors and rotary tables, direct drive motors, rotary motors, and robots. It provides its products for use in semiconductor, optical component manufacturing, automation, medicare and healthcare, and rehabilitation equipment, as well as transportation applications. The company also sells its products in Germany, Japan, the United States, Italy, Switzerland, the Czech Republic, France, and Israel. Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

4577.TWO.summary: Ofuna Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes industrial machinery and equipment in Taiwan. It produces drilling machines, routing machines, and spindles. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4578.TWO.summary: Sogotec Precision Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures CNC machines in Taiwan. It offers printed circuit board (PCB) routing machines, PCB drilling machines, laser application machines, and automation machines. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4580.TWO.summary: Value Valves Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, inspection, and marketing of valves in Taiwan. The company offers butterfly, check, damper, ball, globe, gate, and customized valves. Its products are used in petroleum and petrochemical products, steel, shipbuilding, energy, water treatment, paper, air-conditioning, electronic, and other industrial fields. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4912.TW.summary: Lemtech Holdings Co., Limited manufactures and sells precision metal dies and metal stampings in Asia, Americas, and Europe. The company provides electronic product thermal modules, electronic product components, automotive components and building material components made by stamping and forming, as well as stamping die support for automotive and electronic product manufacturers; and stamping tools, heatsinks and thermal modules, slide rails, precision metal hinges, and mechanical assemblies. It serves automotive, cloud computing, smartphone, medical device, and industrial, as well as computing, consumer, and communication markets. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4999.TW.summary: Sinher Technology Inc. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells various hinge products in Taiwan. The company offers NB hinges, including auto locks, springs, band type hinges, centrals, shafts, and Zn with plate pipe and bend type hinges. It also provides detachable, NB module, and tablet module hinges; AIO and LCD hinges, such as base design type, picture frame type, and multi rotation type hinges; and 3C hinges comprising projector and POS hinges, as well as car hinge and projector products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5007.TW.summary: San Shing Fastech Corp. manufactures and sells steel nuts worldwide. The company offers nut products, including weld, flange, clinch, slotted, locking, wheel, nylon insert, hot forming square and hot forming, and GEOMET coating, as well as auto parts, torque converter parts, customized fasteners, collar, sleeve and spacer, and nut with washer; and bolt products, such as knurled, weld, external 6-lobe, GEOMET coating, shoulder, clinch, special alloy, customized, internal serrated, internal 6-lobe, and double end bolts. It also provides washers, stamping washers and fasteners, and stamping parts and assembly parts; tooling products, which include segmented dies for nut and bolt, carbide six-lobe punch and dies, carbide hex punch, and hot forging and customized tooling; and machinery, such as nut and bolt formers, spindles an round nut tapping machines, optical nut and bolt sorting machines, bolt measurement systems, and nylon insert assembly machines. The company was formerly known as San Shing Hardware Works Co., Ltd. and changed its name to San Shing Fastech Corp. in July 2002. San Shing Fastech Corp. was founded in 1965 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

5009.TWO.summary: Gloria Material Technology Corp. manufactures and sells alloy steel and valve-parts in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include super and titanium alloys; and high cleaning steel, alloy tool steel, high speed steel, stainless steel, quenched-tempered steel, and mold material supply products. It also provides machined parts, such as actuators, blocks, boss products, load caps, and actuator blanks; compressor spacers, seals for gas turbine, turbine blades, and transmission shafts; and copper rod rollers, dummy bar heads, guide rolls, sendzimir rolls, and rolls for slab continuous cast. In addition, the company offers air compressor rotors, bolts, couplings, cryogenic BV shafts, HPBV shafts, locking pins, parts for vacuum equipment, pump shafts, pipe fittings, plugs, turbo charger parts, wheel rings, stems, and taper pins. It serves aerospace, energy, oil and gas, water, medical, and machinery and mold industries. Gloria Material Technology Corp. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

5011.TWO.summary: OFCO Industrial Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of fastener products in Taiwan. Its products include screws, nuts, bolts, and structural assemblies. The company was formerly known as Oriental Fastener Industry LTD. and changed its name to OFCO Industrial Corporation in 2004. OFCO Industrial Corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5015.TWO.summary: Rodex Fasteners Corp. manufactures and sells stainless steel wires and precision made screws worldwide. The company offers stainless steel wires, tapping screws, chipboard screws, machine screws, self-drilling screws, socket cap screws, socket set screws, stainless steel blind rivets, stainless steel thread cutting screws, triangular thread screws, wood screws, high-low thread screws, coarse thread screws, drywall screws, security screws, washer assembly of sems, screws for automatic line, electronic screws, JIS screws, special screws, hexagon nuts, and hexagon nylon lock nuts. Rodex Fasteners Corp. was founded in 1984 and is based in Chungli, Taiwan.

5227.TWO.summary: Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. researches, manufactures, and sells lithium iron phosphate Nano co-crystalline olivine materials (LFP-NCO) in China, other Asia countries, Italy, Taiwan, and internationally. The company also offers olivine-type structure lithium battery materials; and manufactures and distributes batteries, and cars and its peripherals. In addition, it manufactures and installs electricity generation, transmission, and distribution machinery. Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5258.TW.summary: Castles Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells payment solutions for the financial, retail, hospitality, and transportation sectors. Its products include Android, mobile, and EFT POS solutions; and unattended terminals, PIN pads, and other products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5277.TWO.summary: ProLight Opto Technology Corporation engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LED packaging products in Taiwan. The company offers LED products for use in entertainment, architecture, general, automotive, UV, IR, and plant growing lighting applications. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5292.TWO.summary: Desiccant Technology Corporation, through its subsidiary, Shanghai Huajing Environmental Protection and Energy Saving Equipment Limited Company, produces and sells air purification and treatment equipment, plastic processing peripherals equipment, energy-saving equipment, and spare parts. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Zhongli, Taiwan.

5398.TWO.summary: Inalways Corporation engages in the electronic and power supply components manufacturing, and medical biotechnology businesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides IEC connectors, receptacles, power entry modules, wire assemblies, and AC ducks and DC jacks. It also offers prescription and OTC drugs, medical devices, and health supplements. The company was formerly known as Liwei Industrial Co., Ltd and changed its name to Inalways Corporation in July 2017. Inalways Corporation was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5438.TWO.summary: Teco Image Systems Co., Ltd. provides OEM and ODM services to imaging and communication products industries worldwide. The company is involved in the design, development, and manufacture of multi-function printing devices, plain paper facsimiles, digital copiers, and color scanners. It also offers mechanical subsystems comprising control panels and automatic document feeders; optical subsystems, such as scan units; and electronic sub-systems, including printer controller cards, printer network cards, Internet fax cards, fax controllers, and copier controllers. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5460.TWO.summary: Mustang Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells progressive die molds and stamping products in Taiwan. The company provides shielding frame and cover assemblies for tuners; metal stamped frames and covers for signal shielding; and large size metal stamping products, including cover and chassis of set top box and satellite receivers, as well as heat spreaders for IC/chipsets and drawn parts in various shapes. It also offers middle size stamping parts, such as metal frames, brackets, and plates for LCD panels; small size stamping parts comprising springs and contacting fingers for EMC solution; and high precision stamping parts, including micro punching/blanking technology to replace chemical etching, as well as terminals, jumpers, contact springs, etc. Mustang Industrial Corp. was founded in 1972 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5484.TW.summary: EverFocus Electronics Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and service of CCTV surveillance systems, CCD cameras, and digital image processing equipment worldwide. The company offers Edge Computer, a smart surveillance system that provide real-time surveillance footage and access to traffic and road conditions; and multiple interface camera for industrial computers, including USB, RJ-45, etc. It also offers server systems; mobile app and management software that cover transportation, education, surveillance, retail, and medical health care; vehicle surveillance products; and accessories. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5515.TW.summary: Chien Kuo Construction Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan and China. The company offers construction services for residential buildings, factory and office buildings, public facilities, and commercial buildings; undertakes the related electrical and mechanical engineering of air-conditioning, water and electricity, fire-fighting, intelligent building, etc.; and manages electromechanical projects. It also manufactures and sells commercial concrete; and participates in concrete supply and pumping for construction of roads, bridges, and residential projects. The company is also involved in the procurement, planning, installation, and consultation activities; and provision of cargo handling, international trade, and computer software technology development and consultation services. Chien Kuo Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5519.TW.summary: LongDa Construction & Development Corporation engages in the provision of construction services primarily in Taiwan. It also involves in the real estate development and leasing, and hotel business. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

5521.TW.summary: Kung Sing Engineering Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan. Its projects include roads, bridges, tunnels, residential buildings, airports, and railways, as well as marine works. The company was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5536.TWO.summary: Acter Group Corporation Limited provides engineering services in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. It offers construction, design, and maintenance services related to air conditioning, environmental control, clean room set-up, ventilation engineering, and energy technology services. The company also trades in ice water machines and energy storing equipment, as well as offers turnkey services. In addition, it is involved in the wholesale of electronic and chemical equipment; construction and set-up of freezing and electronic equipment, and air conditioners; construction business; design and manufacture of air and liquid containers; and trade of clean rooms and air conditioners. Further, the company provides machinery trading services, as well as acts as an agent for electronic equipment importing and exporting. Additionally, it engages in the design and construction of cleanrooms, electromechanical equipment, and process pipelines for high-tech electronics and biomedical industries. Acter Group Corporation Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5547.TWO.summary: Jioushun Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of luxury houses. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5601.TWO.summary: Taiwan Allied Container Terminal Corp. engages in the container storage and warehouse rental activities. The company is involved in the concentration and decentralization of containers; container cargo unpacking, loading, and unloading; container maintenance and renovation; interlocking warehouses; and other businesses related to container terminals. It also constructs residential and commercial buildings, as well as offers tally packaging products and services. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Keelung, Taiwan.

5604.TWO.summary: Chung Lien Transportation Co., Ltd engages in the real estate rental business. Chung Lien Transportation Co., Ltd was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

5607.TW.long_name: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd
5607.TW.summary: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd operates free trade zone in Taiwan. The park provides enterprises various commercial services and facilities, including automated warehousing facilities; an economic and trading special operation zone which encompasses land, sea, and air transport; and an air cargo terminal, a forwarders building, an international logistics center, and an enterprise business center. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

5608.TW.summary: Shih Wei Navigation Co., Ltd. operates as a dry cargo shipping company in Taiwan. It engages in the shipping transportation, shipping agency, and ship management and chartering, as well as ship sale and purchase activities. The company trades in various types of bulk cargo, such as steel products, ores, etc., as well as equipment, wooden cargos, wood pulps, general cargos, and logs. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

5609.TWO.summary: Dimerco Express Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the international transportation and logistics business. The company offers air freight services, including scheduled consolidation, direct air carrier, airport-to-airport, and door-to-door delivery; ocean freight services; and sea/air and air/sea freight services. It also provides customs brokerage services, such as customs clearance services and professional solutions; and logistics and warehousing services comprising vendor managed inventory, raw materials distribution, finished goods distribution, reverse logistics, after sales logistics, distribution assortment, cross-docking, just-in-time, sequenced supply synchronized delivery management, and in-transit mixing product support services. In addition, the company offers cross-border trucking, domestic transportation, cargo insurance brokerage, and logistics supply chain management consultancy services. Further, it provides integrated value added services that include domestic and cross-border air and road freight, as well as logistics warehousing services, and regular and bonded logistics parks/centers under the China Plus name. The company serves the aerospace, auto components, cabling, communication equipment, computer and peripherals, electrical equipment, electronic equipment and instruments, machinery parts, metals and mining, paper and forest goods, construction materials, telecom parts, plastic products, semiconductors and semiconductor equipment, and tooling industries. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6109.TWO.summary: Atech OEM Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells magnetic components, power supply solutions, and wireless devices in Taiwan. It offers magnetic components, including signal and communication transformers, power transformers, and EMC components; power supply solutions, such as power supply units (PSUs), which includes wall-mounts, desktops, interchangeable AC pins, car chargers, PSR, high surge, AC-DC and DC-DC converters, POE power, and ODM products; open frames, telecom power products, and LED drivers; and medical and industrial PSUs; and wireless devices comprising Bluetooth modules, Bluetooth dongles/adapters, and WiFi modules. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6121.TWO.summary: Simplo Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells battery packs worldwide. Its products include LEV power tool battery, handheld tool battery, and electric vehicle battery modules; household energy storage systems; smartphone, tablet, and laptop battery modules; power banks; wearable devices; and power banks, BT speaker, cleaning robots, wearable devices, and vacuum cleaner Li-ion battery modules. The company also provides machine parts, such as plastic moldings, injections/fixtures/films, metal stampings/trays, and die cut/busbar products; AGV products and automation equipment; and lab testing services, as well as power equipment, industrial robot controllers, machine arms, and industrial cameras. It offers its products for household appliances; and mobile devices, LEV, and EV applications, as well as for fit accessories. The company was formerly known as Simplo Company, Ltd. and changed its name to Simplo Technology Co., Ltd. in September 1998. Simplo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6122.TWO.summary: King Polytechnic Engineering Co., Ltd. operates as an integrated engineering and construction company in Taiwan and internationally. Its services include project planning, design, procurement, construction, commissioning, project management, and turnkey services. The company offers process, civil and structure, piping, equipment, electrical, mechanical, instrument and control, fire protection, and environmental protection work solutions for petrochemical and chemical industries. It also plans, designs, and constructs HVAC systems, cleanrooms, biological cleanrooms, air abatement systems, purified water systems, gas systems, and chemical systems, as well as provides electrical, automatic control, monitoring, fire protection, water supply and drainage, pipeline, air conditioning system, purified water system, gas system, chemical system, and hook-up services for high-tech, microelectronics, electronics, flat panel, semiconductors, optoelectronics, biotechnology, and pharmaceutical industries. In addition, the company offers planning, design, and construction services for various types of infrastructure and public work projects; and constructs green buildings, as well as constructs commercial high-rise buildings, deluxe residential buildings, five-star hotels, luxury recreation villas, and public construction projects. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6125.TWO.summary: Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, design, manufacturing, and sale of logistics centers and intelligent automation integration services in Taiwan. It offers storage equipment, automated packaging equipment, logistic center, material handling equipment systems, automated agriculture/farming equipment, lithium batteries, and heat conduction/heat dissipation equipment. The company was formerly known as Guang Yun Machinery Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. in March 1987. Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6133.TW.summary: Golden Bridge Electech Inc. designs, manufactures, assembles, and sells various cable products in Taiwan. The company offers interconnect solutions for automotive electronics, including electrical harness, interior and car body equipment, and interior lighting; and sensors and electronics, such as plugs and inlet to recharge batteries for electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles. It also provides microphones, speakers, headsets, two-way radios, handheld devices, and intercom systems, as well as programming, cloning, and GPS cables. In addition, the company offers cables, cable assemblies, and integrated system solutions for a range of industrial sectors, including factory automation, drive technology, instrumentation, measurement and sensor technology, audio and video, and high temperature. Further, it provides high bandwidth data and termination cables for datacom and telecom markets; Thunderbolt cable, which connects to host systems or devices; various signal/control cables for power systems; and ultrasound transducer probe cables for medical device applications. Golden Bridge Electech Inc. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6146.TWO.summary: Sporton International Inc. provides product testing and certification services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers mobile device services, including design consultation, training, testing, and certification that allow its customers to acquire certificates and promote products. The company also provides EMC compatibility, safety, radio device, cellphone handset, and NCC testing and certification services, as well as customization services; and sells anti magnetic components. Sporton International Inc. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6160.TWO.summary: Cipherlab Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, markets, and sells automatic identification and data capture products under the CipherLab brand worldwide. The company offers windows/android and proprietary mobile computers; general purpose, business durable, and pocket sized barcode scanners; HF and UHF radio frequency identification readers; and software solutions comprising deployment and development tools, device management, browser and emulation, programming, and scanner software. It serves warehouse, transportation and logistics, field mobility, retail, manufacturing, and healthcare industries, as well as the government. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6164.TW.summary: Ledtech Electronics Corp. produces and sells LED lamps and displays in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers PLCC and high power lighting class components; light modules/engines; flexible and rigid light strips; and standard, super bright, super flux, and bi-color lamps, as well as IR/PT lamps and light sensors. It also provides single digit, dual digit, three digit, four digit, alphanumeric, dot matrix, intelligent, light bar, bar array, and SMT displays; top view, chip LED, right angle, and UVA/UVC SMD products, as well as axial LED products with plastic holders; and backlights. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6208.TWO.summary: Highlight Tech Corp. designs, manufactures, and sells integrated vacuum coating chamber solutions for original equipment manufacturers worldwide. It offers cylindrical, box, D shape, spherical, polygon, bell jar, large, and aluminum vacuum chambers, as well as vacuum modules and systems; vacuum chamber kits; ultra-high vacuum chambers; and vacuum valves, such as vacuum poppet valves, aluminum alloy angle valves, vacuum gate valves, vacuum butterfly valves, rectangular gate valves, pendulum valves, teflon coating vacuum valves, vacuum ball valves, vacuum check valves, vent valves, metal valves, and vacuum valve kits. The company also provides vacuum components, including elbows-tees-crosses, vacuum flanges, teflon bellows, hydroformed vacuum bellows, centering rings, vacuum clamps, adaptor fittings, vacuum viewports, vacuum feedthroughs, and vacuum accessories, as well as KF, ISO, and CF components; and vacuum pumps comprising edwards turbomolecular pumps, scroll and refurbished vacuum pumps, and Ebara dry pump repair kits. In addition, it offers sanitary fittings comprising ferrule blanks, fittings, gaskets, clamps, and adaptors, as well as sanitary valves; perfluoroelastomer O'rings; IC dispensing machines; and centrifugal vacuum mixers. Further, the company provides vacuum pump and valves overhaul services; and refurbished vacuum pump services. Highlight Tech Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

6215.TW.summary: Aurotek Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automation and robotic components under the Aurotek brand in Japan, rest of Asia, Europe, and the United States. Its products include automation and robotics components, such as motors, reducers, sensors, PLC controllers, couplings, ball screws, linear axis actuators, linear bearing systems, motion controllers, motion control ICs, CNC systems, robot control systems, visual identity systems, automatic guided vehicles, self-lube bearings, precision stages, wicking materials, and environmental equipment. The company also offers FA and equipment comprising PCB depaneling systems, robot systems, optical communication machines, DeMeet 3D CNC coordinate measuring machines, and electric screw drivers; and patterning technology and applications, patterned technology and equipment, automatic optical inspection equipment, and laser processing equipment. In addition, it provides isolation and damping devices, natural ventilation systems, and EcoColor external venetian blinds. The company provides solutions to self-lubricated parts; transmissions; power transmissions; drive systems; controllers and robotics for PCB, SMT, LCD, optical, solar, and semiconductor equipment; architectural applications/designs for window operators; seismic isolation systems; and anti-earthquake devices. Aurotek Corporation was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6234.TWO.summary: Tera Autotech Corporation manufactures and sells automation equipment in Taiwan. The company offers automatic storage and logistic equipment; whole plant automated logistic equipment; automatic re-grind machines, product inspection machines, RGV machines, and lock screw machines; CNC machines, welding equipment, and chamber processing machines; and measurement equipment. It also offers drill products, including standard, micro, large, UC, and slot drills, as well as router bits. The company was formerly known as Tera Automation Corporation and changed its name to Tera Autotech Corporation in 2001. Tera Autotech Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6235.TW.summary: Waffer Technology Corporation manufactures and sells light metal products. The company primarily engages in the provision of light-metal solution of magnesium and aluminum alloy, mold and tooling research and development, magnesium alloy injection and die-casting, CNC, and painting and assembly of vertical integration OEM/ODM processing. Its products include cosmetic and internal parts for notebooks; handheld scanners and mobile phone parts; camera, video cam, projector, and monitoring optical parts; and auto parts, as well as other products, such as wearable, tool, and sports products. The company also manufactures and processes automotive aluminum alloy die-cast tools, 3C product magnesium injection tools, and other light metal die-casting tools, as well as fixtures and gauges. It serves medical, industrial, telecommunications, construction, automotive, sporting goods, aeronautical, transportation, national defense, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Waffer Industrial Company, Limited and changed its name to Waffer Technology Corporation in 2000. Waffer Technology Corporation was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6282.TW.summary: AcBel Polytech Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells power management solutions worldwide. It provides a range of custom design and high quality power supplies ranging from 3W up to 10,000W per power module. The company offers industrial PSUs, adapters, medical PSUs, telecom PSUs, AC DC / DC DC converters, and EV PSU solution. Its products are used in information technology, communication, consumer electronics, networks, and industrial automation applications. The company was formerly known as API Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AcBel Polytech Inc. in 1998. AcBel Polytech Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6290.TWO.summary: Longwell Company, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells electronic components and cable products in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, and internationally. The company offers power cords for various applications, such as computers, telecommunications, consumer electronics, and home appliances; and electronic wires and cables, insulation tubes, and heat-shrinkable tubes for use in computers, home appliances, telecommunications, and other electronics products. It also provides cable assemblies for various market sectors, including computer, communication, and consumer electronic and networking industries; connectors primarily for mobile devices, computers, and GPS; wire, AC, and DC halogen free products; and USB output, desk top, car, and wireless chargers, as well as interchangeable plugs, AC and wall-mount adapters, EV charging units, and mechanical components and plastic parts. In addition, the company offers a range of support services. Longwell Company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6409.TW.summary: Voltronic Power Technology Corp. primarily designs, manufactures, markets, introduces, and sells uninterruptible power systems (UPS) in Taiwan and China. The company provides DC, standby, line interactive, and online UPS products; and solar power products, solar inverters, automatic voltage regulators, chargers, and accessories. It also offers ODM design and manufacturing of inverters. The company primarily serves the power market. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6412.TW.summary: Chicony Power Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures and sells switching power supplies, electronic components, LED lighting modules, and smart building solutions in Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. Its power supply products include adapters and power products used in the area of server, storage, telecom, desk-top, gaming, ATM, open frame, and industry power. The company offers LED lamps, tubes, and indoor and outdoor LED luminaires and drivers. It also manufactures and sells transformers and plastic products. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6419.TWO.summary: NUUO Inc. provides surveillance solutions for recording, monitoring, and third party solution integration for IP and analog cameras in Taiwan and internationally. Its NUUO Crystal Family solutions, such as NUUO NuStation, a Linux enterprise solution; NUUO Titan Pro, a Linux-based VMS solution; NUUO Network Storage solution for surveillance applications; and NUUO Crystal, a VMS solution. The company's NUUO Mainconsole Family solutions include NUUO central management system to manage large scale installations and alarms; NUUO Mainconsole, a NUUO PC based video recording server; NUUO Hybrid Appliance solution to choose a pure DVR, pure NVR, or a hybrid system; NUUO NVRmini 2 and NUUO NVRmini 3 portable NVR solutions; NUUO intelligent video surveillance solution; NUUO IP Appliance solution that provides integration between older and newer types of cameras; NUUO Report Service, which visualizes the people counting data into various graphic types; NUUO NVRSolo_Plus, a Linux embedded standalone solution; and NUUO IVS, a video analytics solution. It also offers NUUO Point of Sale (POS) solution that connects surveillance video with transaction data from POS and ATM; NUUO Facial recognition solution that connects surveillance videos with NUUO Nuface software; NUUO license plate recognition (LPR) solution, which connects surveillance videos with third party LPR solutions; and NUUO Access Control solution that connects surveillance video with access control systems from third party partners. In addition, the company offers NUUO iViewer solution to remotely monitor live video from security cameras; NUUO software development kit; NUUO Temperature Monitoring Panel; NUUO thermal detection solution; IP cameras; VZIII, a retail analytics system; and accessories. It serves retail, transportation, industrial, educational, banking, hospitality, and home markets, as well as government. NUUO Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6438.TW.summary: Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures automation system solutions. The company offers automation equipment for printed circuit board, flexible board, IC substrate and packaging, high density interconnect board, and ceramic substrate applications. It is also involved in the design and provision of customized machines for applications in laser technology equipment, TFT-LCD flat panel screens, LEDs, touch panels, and LGP; and wafer, cell, and module manufacturing machines, including inspection systems, as well as intelligent automation integration services. The company was formerly known as SCHMID Automation Asia Co., Ltd. Symtek Automation Asia Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6556.TWO.summary: Topview Optronics Corporation designs, produces, markets, and sells surveillance cameras and peripherals worldwide. The company offers various IP cameras, as well as accessories, including pendant mount and wall mount brackets, corner mount and pole mount adaptors, parapet wall mounts, pendant and wall mount with junction boxes, and sun shields. It also provides after sales services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6558.TW.summary: SYNergy ScienTech Corp. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells rechargeable lithium-ion and lithium-ion polymer batteries in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in various portable electronic products, such as Bluetooth headsets, MP3 and DSC products, cellular phones, and notebook computers, as well as other products. SYNergy ScienTech Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

6559.TWO.summary: High Power Lighting Corp designs, manufactures, and sells LED chips and related components. Its products include UVA, UVB/UVC, IR, and color products. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6593.TWO.summary: Taiwan Name Plate Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic cards, name plates, and membrane switches worldwide. The company offers contactless and sharped, contact only IC, and dual interface IC cards, as well as card personalization services. It also provides embossed metal dome membrane switches, capacitive touch keypads, and printed circuit boards. Taiwan Name Plate Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6618.TWO.summary: UHT Unitech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells medium and high grade carbon fiber in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in aerospace, automotive, energy, and other sectors. The company is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

6624.TWO.summary: Ever-Clear Environmental Eng. Corp. engages in the evaluation, design, construction, and commissioning service of wastewater treatment and organic waste gas treatment facilities. The company is involved in the evaluation/process design/detailed design of wastewater/sludge/underground water/organic waste gas treatment; upgrade or expansion of existed wastewater or organic waste gas treatment plant; reuse of industrial wastewater; and wastewater/sludge/underground water/organic waste gas treatment equipment manufacture and turnkey services. It also provides fine screens, flow measuring tanks, sludge scrapers, anaerobic biological treatment equipment, floating decanter system of sequential batch reactors, physical and chemical treatment equipment, sludge drying equipment, and air pollution control equipment. The company serves food, textile and dying, mechanical and automotive, leather, electric and optoelectronics, biotechnology and pharmaceutical, chemical, pulp and paper, and other industries. Ever-Clear Environmental Eng. Corp. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6667.TWO.summary: Trusval Technology Co., Ltd. provides solutions in the field of water supply system, waste treatment, and system integration. The company offers functional water supply systems, including CO2-DIW, O3-DIW, H2-DIW, and NH3-DIW dissolvers; and waste water treatment advanced processes that include waste acid De H2O2, waste solvent De H2O2, waste solvent De DMSO/DMSO2, waste water degrade IPA, and waste IPA and solvent reclaim, as well as reclaim of copper sulfate by electrolysis. It also provides system integration solutions, such as chemical supply, slurry supply, gas supply, waste chemical collection, and automatic electronics control systems; and engages in the planning, design, construction, and maintenance of equipment, instruments, and field pipes for the facility system in the hi-tech industries. In addition, the company is involved in the semiconductor business. Trusval Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Miaoli, Taiwan.

6691.TWO.summary: Yankey Engineering Co., Ltd. offers engineering services in Taiwan. Its projects include clean room constant temperature and humidity engineering; HVAC commercial fine air conditioning; and high and low voltage transmission, fire system, process pipeline system, water supply and drainage system, process exhaust system, and monitoring and weak current system installation engineering, as well as green energy technology services. Yankey Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in New Taipei, Taiwan.

6705.TWO.summary: MARTAS Precision Slide Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells ball bearing slides for various applications in Taiwan. Its products are used in server rails, cabinets, and cloud computing devices; tool cabinets, fire cabinets, ATM machines, ending machines, POS machines, and upright open showcases; and office furniture, computer desks, copy machines, and fax machines, as well as in kitchen cabinets, dish washers, ovens, and refrigerators. The company's products are also used for automotive applications, such as in sliding arm rests, under seat and glove box storage, and luggage compartments; and residential applications for living rooms, TV cabinets, bedrooms, closets, cupboards, and restaurants. MARTAS Precision Slide Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6706.TW.summary: Fittech Co.,Ltd provides automatic equipment and system integration services for the optoelectronic, semiconductor, and laser industries. The company offers LED probing and testing equipment, including LED chip and wafer probing and testing systems; fully automatic LED wafer prober systems; auto flip-chip probers; auto LED chip probers and tester; high accuracy automatic chip counters; and automatic detaching tape systems. It also provides LD probing and testing equipment, such as VCSEL(PD) probing and testing systems, and edge emitting laser probing and sorting systems; and laser micromachining equipment comprising automatic dual-arm laser wafer and laser wafer marking systems, fully-auto laser marking (inking) systems, and semi-auto PCB laser drilling systems, as well as semi-auto laser cutting, drilling, and scribing systems. In addition, the company offers laser metal machining equipment, including handheld laser cleaning and welding machines; and OEM and LED OEM services. Its products are also used in other photonics and optics, electronics, automotive, and manufacturing industries. The company operates in Taiwan, China, and rest of Asia, as well as internationally. Fittech Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6721.TWO.summary: Sincere Security Co. Ltd. engages in the property management, electrical maintenance, environmental friendly cleaning, and security businesses. The company offers community, factory, and parking lot property management; and director general, administrative secretary, and other manpower dispatch services, as well as generator equipment installation and maintenance, electrical maintenance, central air conditioning system installation and maintenance, air conditioning cooling tower cleaning, water system repair and replacement, fire equipment installation and maintenance, and monitoring system installation services. It also provides environmental friendly cleaning services, such as airport, station, hospital, and building cleaning; floor waxing polishing; stone crystallization grinding; carpet, sofa chair, and office chair sterilization; disinfection; pool cleaning and water quality inspection; exterior wall cleaning; gardening planting; and waste removal services. In addition, the company offers security services, including guardian, system, and personal security, as well as central monitoring system control management services. It serves science parks, hypermarkets, commercial buildings, schools, golf courses, villas and residential areas, and government units. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

6753.TWO.summary: Lungteh Shipbuilding Co, Ltd. designs and builds ships. It engages in building work boats, including environmental services craft and other special purpose vessels, as well as passenger ferries and naval combat boats. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Dongshan, Taiwan.

6754.TW.long_name: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd.
6754.TW.summary: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd. operates as an interior design company in Greater China and internationally. It offers various services, including branding, R&D, design, technology, construction, production, and project management services. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6757.TWO.summary: Tigerair Taiwan Co., Ltd. provides airline services. It offers international transportation services for passengers and cargo; and ground handling services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Tigerair Taiwan Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Airlines Co., Ltd.

6793.TWO.long_name: Tien Li Offshore Wind Technology Co., Ltd.
6793.TWO.summary: Tien Li Offshore Wind Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells wind turbine blades, wind turbine molds, and other products. It also provides offshore wind operation and maintenance, as well as blade or composite materials research and development technical advisory services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6803.TWO.summary: ECOVE Environment Corp. provides engineering and environmental services to public and private entities in Taiwan, Macau, China, Southeast Asia, India, and the United States. It finances, plans, constructs, operates, and maintains energy-from-waste plants, hazardous and special waste treatment plants, water and wastewater treatment plants, photovoltaic power plants, and resource reclamation and treatment plants. The company's services include operations and maintenance, consulting, and investment and development of public and private entities. It also offers technical and consulting services, such as mechatronics system and equipment maintenance and upgrade, commissioning, and testing for energy-from-waste, railway, waste management, and public utility sectors. In addition, the company is involved in developing, operating, and managing photovoltaic power plants with a total capacity of 25 megawatts; and the recycling of PET bottles. The company was formerly known as KD Holding Corp. ECOVE Environment Corp. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. ECOVE Environment Corporation operates as a subsidiary of CTCI Corporation.

6812.TWO.summary: Saul Tech Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells precision equipment. It offers IC products in various series, such as wafer to tray, wafer to wafer, wafer to tape, and multi-function sorter products; LED mapping sorters and mini LED die attachments; and LD bar attachments. The company is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

7402.TWO.summary: Brinno Incorporated designs, develops, produces, and sells imaging devices. The company offers time lapse, construction, and outdoor security cameras; camera kits; and smart home security products, as well as time lapse accessories. It also provides contact tracing COVID-19 products; and Friday home smart locks. The company offers its products through distributors worldwide. Brinno Incorporated was founded in 2003 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

7443.TWO.summary: Fluxtek International Corp. manufactures and sells RO water purification equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers compact systems, residential systems, purifier systems, commercial systems, dispensers, filters/membranes, housing caps, pumps/transformers, tanks/faucets, fittings, and coconut shell carbon products. It also provides accessories, such as leak detectors, housing wrenches, shut off valves, pressure regulators, flow restrictors, mini digital TDS meters, pressure gauges, high and low pressure switches, solenoid and needle valves, and control boxes. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Pingtung City, Taiwan.

7507.TWO.summary: Enrestec Inc engages in the pyrolysis and recycling of used plastic, rubber, and organic wastes. It is also involved in the development of soil thermal desorption technology and application. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Pingtung, Taiwan.

8021.TW.summary: Topoint Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells micro-drills, numerically controlled drilling machines, and peripheral equipment for printed circuit boards in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers products, such as drill bit, a product used in PCB mechanical drilling process; router bit, a material used for achieving necessary outlines; and slot drills used in cutting forces, as well as logarithmic cylindrical roller, a solution for conventional bearing manufactures. It also provides standard cutting tools used in industrial milling applications, which include stamping, and profile and face milling; and customized cutting tools for metal casing production and metal injection process. In addition, the company offers drilling services comprising mechanical and laser drilling, routing, and CCD routing services. Topoint Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8038.TWO.summary: Changs Ascending Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of rechargeable batteries and cell materials in Taiwan. The company offers vehicle batteries, including starter batteries for golf carts, forklifts, and hybrids and E-cars; and electronic storage systems (ESS) and uninterruptible power supply (UPS) systems for use in office and home applications, ESS UPC backup power, off the grid applications, and solar LED lights. It also provides grid and industrial ESS/UPS energy storage and back-up systems for large UPS, micro grid ESS, mission critical UPS, and traffic light back-up applications. The company was formerly known as Changs Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changs Ascending Enterprise Co., Ltd. in July 2000. Changs Ascending Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

8092.TWO.long_name: Chien Wei Precise Technology Co., Ltd.
8092.TWO.summary: Chien Wei Precise Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precise molding and measuring machines, and machine tools worldwide. Its products include 2D/3D precise measuring instruments, precision JIG grinders, machining centers, vertical grinding machines, IC-semiconductor special accessories, trimming and forming products, ultra-precision optics, and DVD molds. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8114.TW.summary: Posiflex Technology, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells point of sale (POS) management systems and peripheral equipment in Taiwan, the United States, Germany, Japan, India, China, Singapore, and Malaysia. It provides mobile POS, POS terminal, all in one POS, infotainment terminal, digital signage, POS box, and kiosk products, as well as android platform. The company also offers POS monitors, line displays, POS printers, cash drawers, POS keyboards, barcode scanners, magnetic stripe card readers, attachments, MT accessories, and IO boxes. It serves customers in the retail, catering, large-scale shopping centers, chain stores, entertainment venues, logistics, medical institutions, and e-commerce businesses under the POSIFLEX brand name. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8281.TWO.summary: Appro Technology Inc. engages in the design and development of a range of security and surveillance systems in Taiwan. The company offers cloud IP cameras, including Wi-Fi and IP cameras; professional IP cameras, such as box IP, fixed-dome, speed dome, bullet, and fisheye IP cameras; video servers; network video recorders; and accessories, such as racks and mounts. It also provides software solutions comprising AppPro APP and Central Management System 1030. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8341.TW.long_name: Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
8341.TW.summary: Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the medical waste incineration business in Taiwan and China. The company is involved in the collection, incineration, solidification, physicochemical, transportation, landfill, and treatment of hazardous, general business, and bio-medical wastes. It also manufactures and sells pollution control equipment. In addition, the company engages in the installation engineering for waste cleaning activities; environmental engineering consulting activities; and environmental protection engineering construction activities. Further, it is involved in the waste treatment, waste removal, material recovery, resource recycling, environmental testing and sanitation activities; and design and manufacture, test set-up, and operation of equipment. The company was formerly known as Sunny Friend Waste Disposal co., ltd. and changed its name to Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2000. Sunny Friend Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Yunlin County, Taiwan.

8342.TWO.summary: I Jang Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial storage equipment, and custom-made and household products worldwide. The company offers store display products, such as fruit, display, and flower racks; display, shopping basket, and mesh shop display stands; display tables; and wire rotary displays, as well as healthcare products comprising binder, shelves binder, and medical trolley carts; and shelving covers. It also provides moving storage rack systems, cylinder and cargo trolleys, warehouse cages, trolley and tool carts, and metal pallets for logistics and warehouses; and stainless steel trolleys and storage racks, working carts, stainless steel work tables, and storage racks for food services and restaurants. In addition, the company offers customized display stands, AGV pallets, and foldable display racks. Further, it provides home furniture products, such as wagons, heavy duty and corner shelving, slimline and other shelving, and magazine racks. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Changhua City, Taiwan.

8349.TWO.summary: QST International Corp. manufactures and sells automotive fasteners and metal parts worldwide. It provides proprietary fasteners, such as screws and induction hardened bolts; and auto fasteners, including weld bolts and weld studs, screws and washer assemblies, multi-die headed pins and rivets, and special screws per print, as well as internal, external, and non-fasteners. The company also offers third party testing and consulting services, as well as training services; and logistics services, including tailored services that consist of JIT, kanban, VMI, Bar Code, 2 Bin, in-house crib and products integration, localization, joint design, and value analysis and engineering to OEM assembly plants, as well as operates Halofast.com/VMI, a Web-based EDI platform to provide remote VMI service. QST International Corp. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

8349A.TWO.summary: QST International Corp. manufactures and sells automotive fasteners and metal parts worldwide. It provides proprietary fasteners, such as screws and induction hardened bolts; and auto fasteners, including weld bolts and weld studs, screws and washer assemblies, multi-die headed pins and rivets, and special screws per print, as well as internal, external, and non-fasteners. The company also offers third party testing and consulting services, as well as training services; and logistics services, including tailored services that consist of JIT, kanban, VMI, Bar Code, 2 Bin, in-house crib and products integration, localization, joint design, and value analysis and engineering to OEM assembly plants, as well as operates Halofast.com/VMI, a Web-based EDI platform to provide remote VMI service. QST International Corp. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

8367.TW.summary: Chien Shing Harbour Service Co.,Ltd. provides customs declaration, transportation, warehousing, ship stevedoring, and container terminal services in Taiwan. The company offers customs declaration services, including import and export declarations of general and bonded goods, and project production machinery; customs declarations of triangular trade and entreport trade; export and import declarations of the whole plant equipment; applying letter of tax exemption for import goods duty from industrial development bureau; consultation service of tariff laws and regulations; and consolidation service of bonded warehouse, warehousing, transportation, stevedoring, and container terminals. It also provides transportation services comprising drayage of local and long distance shipments; less than truckload and full truckload; shipments moving from port, warehouse, and factories, as well as arranges local pick-up and delivery shipment integration and shipments through one point for shipping locations; and configured transportation solutions. In addition, the company offers warehousing services, such as general warehouse, warehouse rental, distribution center, bonded warehouse, and outdoor piling field; integration of reforming the goods, processing, packaging change, labeling, etc.; and ship stevedoring services, including warehouse cargo turn-in and out, and longshoring services. Further, it provides container terminal services comprising empty container services, such as cleaning, repairing, and checking services; information of containers and goods movement; accounts receivable collection on behalf of freight ship companies; CFS import and export cargo handling, distribution, and measurement services; pre-cooling, power, and inspection services; customs declaration and transportation arrangement services; and receiving and delivery, crane unloading, storage, inspection, and transfer services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8374.TW.summary: Ace Pillar Co., Ltd., an industrial automation company, distributes automatic mechatronics components in Taiwan and internationally. It offers automation controller and monitor systems, such as human machine interfaces, PLCs, magnesensors/laserscales, CCD cameras, CNC machine tool solutions, and fanless embedded systems; and automation drive control systems, including servo systems, linear servo and direct drive motors, PACs, and high-speed motion control systems. The company also provides inverters; automation mechanical transmission systems comprising couplings, harmonic reducers, precision bearings, planetary reducers, linear guideways, and ETP bushings; and pneumatic components, such as air-operated valves for chemical liquids, air conditioning units, solenoid valves, pneumatic cylinders, multi axis stages, and power pack with inverters. In addition, it offers technical services for the automation manufactures and customers. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8390.TWO.summary: Jiin Yeeh Ding Enterprises Corp. engages in recycling and refining precious metals in Taiwan. It operates professional cleaning and recycling facilities that clean shutters, recycle precious metals, sift disintegrated materials, and prevent pollution, as well as owns recycling and cleaning vehicles. The company serves semiconductor, printer circuit, computer components, electro-optical, passive components, telecommunication, and other industries. Jiin Yeen Ding Enterprise Corp. was founded in 1997 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

8410.TWO.summary: Sentien Printing Factory Co., Ltd. produces, supplies, and sells heat transfer, insert mold, and in-mold label and release foils in Taiwan. Its heat transfer films are used in house wares, cosmetics, stationeries, appliances, and janitorial applications; and in-mold labels are used in plastic plates or cups applications. The company's in-mold decoration films are used in consumer electronic products, appliances, and automotive interior components applications; and insert molding films are used in smart appliances, and interior and exterior of automobiles and motorbikes applications. Sentien Printing Factory Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

8415.TWO.summary: Brighton-Best International (Taiwan) Inc. sells screws and nuts primarily in Taiwan, North America, and Oceania. It also engages in import, export, and sale of aluminum products; and investment activities. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Tainan, Taiwan.

8422.TW.summary: Cleanaway Company Limited operates as an intermediate treatment solidification company within the waste disposal process in Taiwan. It offers waste solidification and excavation, waste landfill, and waste clearing services. The company is also involved in waste disposal, waste clean-up, waste management, general investment, and enterprise management consultation activities. Its principal customers include those in the steel and iron, electronics, optoelectronics, petrochemicals, electroplating, leather processing, metal processing, and tenders of other public and private enterprises. The company was formerly known as Cleanaway Kang Lien Co Ltd. and changed its name to Cleanaway Company Limited in May 2009. Cleanaway Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

8481.TW.summary: Transart Graphics Co., Ltd. operates in the screen print industry worldwide. The company manufactures and sells customized stickers and water transfer/heat transfer decals for the purpose of corporate identity and decorating products. It also offers self-adhesive sticker serial, nameplates and graphic overlays, dry rub-on transfer, color printed thermal forming plastic, brushed metal-like nameplates, and titanium flash. The company primarily serves bicycle, sporting goods, and various other industries. Transart Graphics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

8905.TWO.long_name: Eagle Cold Storage Enterprise Co., Ltd.
8905.TWO.summary: Eagle Cold Storage Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the processing and trade of vegetables and meat products in Taiwan. It offers frozen beef, hot pot meat, and canned products, as well as imports and sells meat, french fries, green beans, and other commodities. The company also develops, constructs, leases, and sells residential houses. In addition, it is involved in the cold storage, warehousing, logistics, and distribution business. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

8906.TWO.summary: Forward Graphic Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates in the printing industry in Taiwan. The company provides product design, prepress, printing equipment, and post press services. It offers printing services for various packages, such as boxes, gift boxes, chocolate boxes, and bags; books; notebooks; catalogue/flyers; calendars; and special, DIY, and ECO friendly products. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8926.TW.summary: Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates cogeneration plants in Taiwan. The company invests in independent power plants (IPPs), cogeneration plants, and renewable energy power plants utilizing solar, wind, geothermal, and biomass energy. It also offers engineering planning, design, procurement, project development, installation, construction, financing, commissioning, operation, maintenance, and management for IPPs, cogeneration plants, and transmission projects. In addition, the company provides technical support and consulting services for power project investment, project development, construction execution, and power plant operation and maintenance. Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8930.TWO.summary: CKM Applied Materials Corp. develops metal building materials in Taiwan. The company offers ceiling suspension systems, such as exposed T grids and partition frame systems; metal ceilings, including flat, perforated, embossed, mesh, baffle, curve, linear grid, honeycomb, extrusion, crossing, triangular, strip, and cell ceilings; and micro-perforated acoustical panels. Its products are used in governmental buildings, hospitals, schools, department stores, hotels, factories, public and residential buildings, and commercial buildings. The company was formerly known as CKM Building Material Corp. and changed its name to CKM Applied Materials Corp. in July 2017. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tainan city, Taiwan.

8936.TWO.summary: Kuo Toong International Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and assembles water supply and division pipes in Taiwan. The company offers various concrete products, including prestressed concrete cylinder and non-cylinder pipes, reinforced concrete pipes, reinforced concrete cylinder pipes, concrete pipes for sewerage in jacking method, prestressed beams, precast prestressed concrete culverts, manholes for sewerage, shield-segments, and other concrete products. It also provides ductile iron pipes, DI flexible pipes, connecting closures, and accessories; and various steel pipe items comprising coated steel pipes for water service, polyethylene coated and lined steel pipes, steel pipes by jacking method, steel flexible pipe joints, connecting closures, fittings, and weight-coated offshore pipes. In addition, the company offers services for the design, manufacturing, and construction of water supply and division pipes through no-dig jacking methods; and specific mechanical equipment and plant set up, and operation of seawater desalination, water, and sewage water. Kuo Toong International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8996.TW.summary: Kaori Heat Treatment Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells heat exchanger solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers brazed plate heat exchangers for use in HVAC, refrigeration, cooling, heating, heat recovery, green energy, and other industries, as well as for residential applications; and accessories, such as connectors, flanges, insulation foams, and stud bolts. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

9917.TW.summary: Taiwan Secom Co., Ltd. provides security services in Taiwan. It operates through four segments: Electronic System, Static Guard Service, Cash Delivery Service, and Logistics Service. The company manufactures, processes, and sells security-related equipment and parts, as well as offers corporate and building security guarding services; in-flight catering and related services; and cash delivery, logistic, air cargo transporting, building management, automated teller machine, custom broker, vehicle maintenance, educational and recreational, car parking lot, light controlling system, and technology support services. It also sells electric, telecommunication, fireproof, and other products; produces and sells instant foods; connects police-citizens; retails POS system; and rents automated external defibrillators and mini-storage, as well as rents and sells videos. In addition, the company manufactures and sells digital signage and monitors; wholesales and installs fire safety equipment; and retails and rents medical equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of international trade, as well as acts as an insurance broker. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

9933.TW.summary: CTCI Corporation provides engineering, procurement, and construction services in Asia, the Middle East, and the Americas. It offers services, such as project management; feasibility study and front-end engineering design; engineering; procurement; fabrication; construction; commissioning; intelligent solutions; automation and control; intelligent structure jacking and movement; ground freezing; and operations and maintenance services, as well as clean room, mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering solutions The company also provides stationery equipment, including pressure vessels; piping pre-fabrication and heat exchangers; pre-fabricated parts of package equipment; and assists with engineering works that comprise basic design, equipment sizing, engineering, and shop drawings; and performs equipment inspection/revamping, plant shut-down inspection, and plant maintenance works. In addition, it offers chemical additives consisting of antifouling agents, anti-polymerization additives, and corrosion inhibitors for petrochemical plants; antifoam, antifouling, additives, and emulsion breaking additives as well as corrosion inhibitors for refinery plants; and heavy metal chelate agents, heavy metal stabilizers, boiler water treatment additives, and active carbon products for incineration plants. Further, the company provides intelligent energy management system, an integrated software that monitors, analyzes, adjusts, and manages energy consumption. It serves hydrocarbon, power, environmental, transportation, and industrial markets. CTCI Corporation was incorporation in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

9945.TW.summary: Ruentex Development Co., Ltd. provides construction and civil engineering contracting services in Taiwan and China.
